Container.Overview: Splunk is a remote syslog server that accepts any data feed.
Container.Name: splunk
Container.Description: [h3]splunk[/h3] Splunk captures, indexes, and correlates real-time data in a searchable repository from which it can generate graphs, reports, alerts, dashboards, and visualizations. Try it as your remote syslog server![br][br] [h2][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']IMPORTANT:[/span][/h2] [b]By running this docker you accept the Splunk license agreement.[/b][br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/opt/splunk/var[/b] : this path is where splunk will store it\'s databases.[br] [b]/opt/splunk/etc[/b] : this path is where splunk will store it\'s config files.[br] [b]/data[/b] : this path is added so splunk will monitor the host (i.e. /var/log).[br] [b]/license[/b] : if mapped, this path should hold the license file if wanting to use splunk enterprise.[br]
